title: Holistic Detox Kit
cleaned_text: Description Joshi's highly-acclaimed holistic detox plan is available in this convenient kit, with a step by step guide and 21 days' supply of four different nutritional supplements. The supplements work in combination to enhance the cleansing effect of the detox, curb cravings and promote a healthier metabolism. . Included in kit This comprehensive kit includes: a guide booklet with 21 days supply of Joshi's bespoke supplements: - Deep Clean (84 capsules) - Flush (84 capsules) - Lighter Liver (84 capsules) - Sweet Revenge (84 capsules) Instructions These four supplements work together to maximise the effectiveness of the holistic detox: - Lighter Liver - A complex herbal blend created by Joshi with your liver in mind. Take 2 daily before breakfast & 2 before dinner - Sweet Revenge - With Chromium and Niacin to help maintain normal blood sugar levels. Take 2 daily before breakfast & 2 before dinner - Flush - A formula rich in antioxidants and herbs created by Joshi with your kidneys in mind. Take 2 daily before breakfast & 2 before dinner - Deep Clean - A traditional herbal blend that works gently with your own digestion. Take 4 daily before sleep
